group_1.textLeft: Phew…very good.
I never imagined we would lose track@of a baby.

group_1.textRight: At least we got him back to his mom,@so it's all good.

group_1.textLeft: I'm relieved that it didn't end in tragedy.

group_1.textRight: But still…

group_1.textLeft: Hm?

group_1.textRight: If you keep pushing yourself to protect@everyone,
you won't be able to take care of yourself.@You need to take it easy sometimes.

group_1.textLeft: Well, I don't intend to spread myself too thin…
And I have nothing to fear with you@by my side, do I not?
You're a protector, just like I am.

group_1.textRight: You're selfish more than anything, Tsuyu!

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what's gotten into you…?@You've been snapping at me all day...

group_1.textRight: And why shouldn't I?
You made your wish to save the sacred tree,@you protect everyone and work tirelessly,
and if that wasn't enough, you volunteered@yourself for the iron-branded oath, too!
If you don't stop, you'll grind yourself down@to nothing.

group_1.textLeft: I never considered that…
Still, my body remains in prime condition.

group_1.textRight: Well, what if the whole world went@straight to hell…?
If that happened and you could only save@one thing, Tsuyu, what would you choose?

group_1.textLeft: I don't know what I'm supposed to say…
I see.

group_1.textRight: Oh, have you decided?

group_1.textLeft: Everything is part of the world! Therefore, if I@save the world, I save everything else, too!

group_1.textRight: I didn't ask that just so you could@be a smartass...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, go ahead.

group_1.textRight: I see…you've come today as well.

group_1.textLeft: Oh hey, thanks for all the help.

group_1.textRight: I thought we'd increased our patrols, but you@still keep sneaking past us, Chizuru…

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* Well hey, that's my specialty.

group_1.textRight: It's not a very amusing issue for us…

group_1.textLeft: So what did you need me for?

group_1.textRight: Oh yes, that's right.
A few minutes ago, a priest from the Mizuna@Shrine came to speak with me.
He informed me the shrine will be inviting@your favorite dance troupe to perform.

group_1.textLeft: What? [chara:104501:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:104501:cheek_0][chara:104501:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.txt][chara:104501:lipSynch_1]Wait, really?!

group_1.textRight: If you're interested, please feel free to attend.

group_1.textLeft: You don't even have to ask!
Indeed, we must protect and preserve@this dance tradition.

group_1.textRight: Ugh, you're giving yourself even MORE@things to protect…
Hm?
